variable_description: Was there a delay on the first trial? 0=no, 1=yes, 888=N/A, 999=missing
Number of doors opened (not forced trials). 888=N/A, 999=missing
Number of delays after a reward. 888=N/A, 999=missing
Number of delays after a punishment. 888=N/A, 999=missing
doorsOpened - 12 or if <12 = 0 because 8 or 12 doors opened is optimal , looking at positive deviations from 12
Negative deviations from 8, excluding children who quit before receiving a punishment (in trial 5). Computed 0 is > 8, N/A if < 5, and as 8 minus doorsOpened otherwise.
